moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Nc3 g6 4. Bc4 Bg7: this is a mistake which white could have taken advantage of.  5 ... Nf6 was the right move.
moves.6. a3: instead 6 Ng5! is very tough to answer.  6 ... 0-0 loses to 7 Nxf7 Rxf7 8 Qf3 and 6 ... d5 7 Nxd5 Qxg5 8 Nxc7+ Kd8 9 Nxa8 is rather unappealing.
moves.6... O-O 7. d3: here again 7 Ng5 was a difficult move to answer.
moves.12. Ne2 d5 13. exd5 Nxd5 14. Bf2 Nxe2+: with this move black gets an attack going
moves.15. Qxe2 Nf4 16. Qe3 Qg5 17. Bg3: 17 g3 was the only move.  after that 17 ... Nh3+ gives black some attacking chances
moves.17... Nh3+ 18. gxh3 Qxe3+ 19. Kg2: after 19 Rf2 black snags another piece with 19 ... f4 and ... g5
after 28 Kf1 Qb6 29 b4 Bxc3 allows black to win pawns at will.
